content.text:
Mr. HELLER. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate 
proceed to legislative session for a period of morning business, with 
Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.
content.speaker: Mr. HELLER

content.text:
The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
  The Senator from Nevada.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
